---
title: "does the crowd effect who wins nrl games?"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(here)
i_am("research/crowd-effects.Rmd")

source(paste0(here(),"/R/get-data.R"))

crowd_df <- get_data(year_span = 2012:2022) %>%
  select(crowd, is_home_team_winner)

skim(crowd_df)
```

```{r}
crowd_glm <- glm(is_home_team_winner ~ crowd, data = crowd_df, family = "binomial")
summary(crowd_glm)
```
